title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: A Response to Anti-Tank Missile Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanese territory; a terrorist cell that launched an anti-tank missile was attacked.

IDF fighter jets and helicopters attacked terrorist infrastructures and rocket launching sites of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanese territory in response to earlier rocket fire towards Israeli territory earlier today. IDF forces attacked using the “Okez Pleda” combat means a military infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanese territory.

In addition, IDF forces attacked using a combat helicopter, remote-controlled aircraft, and tanks a cell that launched an anti-tank missile towards Biranit area and the launcher site from which they carried out the shooting.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/49Ja1d7
